pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of RNA Cytosine-5 Methylation // Bisulfite-treated RNA non-conversion in a set of samples is analysed as follows : each sample's non-conversion distribution is identified to a Poisson distribution. P-values adjusted for multiple testing are calculated in each sample. Combined non-conversion P-values and standard errors are calculated on the intersection of the set of samples. For further details, see C Legrand, F Tuorto, M Hartmann, R Liebers, D Jakob, M Helm and F Lyko (2017) doi:10.1101/gr.210666.116.
